EmailTemplate.name: 4_1_2014_VMUG Seattle Pre-Event mailer.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Seattle VMUG is April 1st. Will You Be There?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Seattle VMUG April 1, 2014 | Hyatt Regency Bellevue
Register Now: <http://bit.ly/1dqxI6p> VMTurbo engineers will be at Booth #46 to discuss virtualization management and the features of our latest release, VMTurbo Operations Manager 4.5 <http://bit.ly/NwkYVh>, including:
- Control modules for NetApp, EMC, and Cisco UCS that allow you to manage and control both fabric and storage - Distributing loads across all hosts in your environment by eliminating artificial cluster boundaries - allowing for even greater utilization and densities while assuring VM performance - Intelligent, truly-automated stack control for your SDDC
In addition to leading the virtual revolution, VMTurbo has been busy collecting hardware (Awards, not blades):
- #26 Forbes America's Most Promising Companies 2014 - TechTrailblazers Who To Watch in 2014 First Place in Virtualization - Storage Magazine's Product of the Year 2013 Bronze Level in Storage Management Tools
See you in Seattle, VMTurbo
